ValidationRule.description: Requires Census and Payroll Instructions Sent date to enter dates for Census/Eligibility Uploaded or 1st Payroll.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ( ISBLANK( Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c ) = FALSE) || ( ISBLANK( X1st_Payroll_Date__c ) = FALSE) ) && ( ISBLANK( Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c ) = TRUE) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c , "Conversion Plan")) && RecordType.Name != "Single(k) Plus Plan"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate the date for "Census and Payroll Instructions Sent"
